metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20631 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in libgpac.a in GPAC before 0.8.0, as demonstrated by MP4Box. It contains an invalid pointer dereference in gf_list_count in utils/list.c that can cause a denial of service via a crafted MP4 file.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
